modalities.speech: Air Asia has organized a unique food review event at the Sky Gourmet Kitchens, inviting bloggers from New Delhi to sample their elaborate in-flight menu, which features a range of options including oriental, Indian, and continental dishes. The reviewer enjoyed various dishes, including veg enchilada and Andhra chicken, and praised the menu's variety and presentation, making it a pleasant experience. To get the best of AirAsia's menu, pre-booking is essential, which can only be done on AirAsia.com. By booking both flight tickets and meals on the website, you can enjoy substantial savings.
